เกมออนไลน์ที่มีความหลากหลาย ทั้งเล่นคนเดียวเป็นฆาตกรไปฆ่าผู้เล่นคนอื่น และเล่นกับเพื่อน เป็นผู้รอดชีวิตช่วยกันซ่อมไฟเพื่อเปิดประตูหนีจากฆาตกร หรือจะสร้างห้องเล่นกับเพื่อน ให้เพื่อนมาไล่ฆ่ากันเองก็ได้(ผู้รอดชีวิต 4 คน ฆาตกร 1 คน) แนะนำให้เล่นซ่อมไฟกับเพื่อนจะสนุกดี
ปล.อย่าพึ่งยอมแพ้ ฝึกๆเล่นไปเดี๋ยวก็เก่งนะ ทั้งฝึกฟังเสียงผู้รอดชีวิต และก็ฝึกดูหาฆาตกร

don't let me lie , but the game is great  
and if there are bugs,
which game doesn't have them?
Toxic players are a bigger problem, but  if you ignore them and don't get nervous because of them ,
you enjoy playing !!

Number 2 is the problem about rank sistem ! Because it will happen many times as a  beginner  (20-17)lvl rank ,
that you will get the players who are 2-3-5-10.13 rank lvl .. and a lot of people say that rank has nothing to do with it
Because if you are bad at the game you are bad and if you are good you are good,
but how to play against a player who has 300-500-1000 hours more playing time,who knows the map,
better than you and other things ...game operators need to fix it 
but that won't happen any time soon
my recommendation is to buy the game 
and enjoy !

Allora, ho scritto varie recensioni con il passare degli anni per questo gioco, non sono mai riuscito a esprimermi per bene ma adesso voglio riprovarci. Comincio con il dire che gioco a dead by daylight da parecchi anni ormai, ci ho giocato anche tanto tempo, mi ha divertito e intrattenuto moltissimo, è stato anche la mia ossessione e stile di vita, nonché la cosa che più facevo. Parlando del gioco, ha molti difetti, i vari bug mai fixati che bene o male, ci sono sempre e per qualsiasi tipo di aggiornamento, da sempre. Conosciuto per quanto sia buggato Dead by Daylight riamane un acquisto valido e un bellissimo gioco, a parer mio,  di un'originalità unica e divertente da giocare con amici, molto complessa è la dinamica di gioco, ma se si ha voglia di addentrarci in quello che è il mondo di dbd sarà più che piacevole.
Purtroppo la comunity di questo gioco credo sia una delle peggiori in assoluto, fa schifo, però non facciamoci rovinare un gioco per questo motivo.

Full of campers and tunnelers. This game is bad and if you want to commit in game suicide this is the game for you.

I've been playing this game for ages now. I won't lie. It's a fun game. I just hate how nothing new happens other than a new killer/survivor + skins. I'm not saying we need new modes or anything. Things could be added to the base game we already have. But the devs don't give a shit about the community. They literally output shit no one asked for and unless it's a literal game breaking bug or something that would deter us from purchasing a new killer/survivor, they don't give a shit about what we say. I don't recommend buying this game. I think this game should be free at base, THEN they can allow people to purchase DLC. I've spent a lot of this game, but no more. I don't want to give the greedy devs money for them to just shit in our faces. 

I'm not even going to go in on how this community is utter garbage. That's a story for another day. Have fun. :)

Unless you only play the killer this game will be best with friends, though i've had some phenomenal games with randoms as well. You have to know your stuff to do really well in this game but playing and looking at perks and learning how they work will let you succeed in this game. It all gets better and easier for you with time. They intend at some point to make the perk grind easier as well so look forward to that if you dont enjoy grinding for three tiers of one perk. Overall great game the devs work hard on the game.

J'aurais pu le recommandé, c'est vrais
J'y es jouer une longue période, et j'ai adoré le jeux, malgré quelque joueurs toxic il y avait toujours une possibilité d'amusement constant, surtout que la commu en elle même, faisais tous pour que se genre de joueurs sois visible.
Jouer avec ces amis étais un plaisir énorme...
Mais plus le rang augmente plus l'amusant n'est qu'une partis de compétition, qui à le meilleur niveau qui à le meilleur de compétence ou même qui à le meilleure tueurs ?
petit à petit, que l'on joue tueur ou survivants, il faut simplement connaissance et niveau pour se moquer des autres, J'y es trouvé longement mon réconfort dans se jeux sans parler des nombreuse rigolade que je m'y suis procuré.
Mais peu à peu le jeux c'est mis à changer à devenir, moins amusant, ils sortent des tueurs ou survivants bien trop souvent, sa en devient ennuyents sa se répète sans fin, c'est souvent stimulant mais derrière, ont gaspille de l'argents sans s'en rendre compte, et surtout qu'il y à des joueurs mesquin, qui veulent simplement retiré l'envie de jouer à certain des bug, des tunnel camp etc etc...
ça resteras répétitif tt de mm je vous recommande avec vos amis d'y jouer mais pas, à y jouer indéfiniment si ont ne veut pas parler que de rang de niveau stratège et autres..

Игра превратилась в помойку, маньяки тут = клоуны. Пока ты бегаешь за сурвом не на: рин, нюрсе и ещё 1-2 норм манах. Сурвы вычинивают геники за 3 мигуты. Маньяков режут, сурвов апают, к примеру понерфили стрелка. Вообщем игру не советую сберегите деньги и время.

所以平衡方向到底是什么？人屠互动还是人屠对抗？想做互动那你为什么要一直缩短对局时间还出幻神，想做对抗那你为什么不把那些弟弟屠夫重做还搁这一直出厄咒这种不稳定的技能？
另外古书这东西，你要是不往里面放脑残任务还好说，放这么多看起来正常对局能完成但实际上完成不了的任务干什么？本来就梦游的队友古书任务一出更加梦游了，真挺恶心的。
另外段位这东西很迷，彩虹段位局经常出现，还有四红大战一绿。段位越高普通玩家体验越差，红段人类不一定会溜但一定会修，屠夫全用幻神或高配，完全就是抗压段。不知道为什么这么多人愿意升段，去拿那些多打几局就有的血点？你要是普通的单排仓鼠精人类玩家那我建议演几局，段位一上去就成痛苦杀鸡了。屠夫玩家的话倒是不用演，正常打就行，毕竟人类段位随便上，要是不能上就去救个人，再不行就多救一个。
一个模式玩几年，我寻思你至少出个排位模式让休闲玩家和竞技玩家分开来吧，现在全混在一起对局体验和过山车一样，血压也是。
